28625.どこに 行きますか？\n<break>:
Where do you want to go?
<break>

120315.住宅村の中で 『空いている土地をさがす』から\n指定した地区の 空いてる土地だけ:
You can search only for available land in the specified area by clicking "Search for Vacant Land" in the Housing Village!
After selecting the area and lot size you want to search, select "Search All Blocks" and only available lots will be listed.
Selecting a lot on the list you want to buy will take you to the district of that block.
Whenever you refresh the page with "View Next 50" or "View Previous 50", sold lots will disappear from the list.
